content.description: Question 8 asks you to identify a rhythm. After the question is announced, you will have ten seconds to read the choices. It is important that you read the choices carefully before the example is played. The example will be played twice, with a brief pause between playings. Now listen to the music for Question 8 and identify the rhythm that matches the example played.
content.question: Which of the following is played?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
